Articles.Content:
I'mm not entirely sure what's going on here, but the FL-T200 has a bug in the attachment point it seems, or I'm doing something wrong. It leaves a small gap between the other parts

My mod list is extensive, and I'm on mobile, so will answer questions about what mods I have installed
I am not sure, probably a stock bug.

That's what I was thinking too.. it's literally just the 200.. I could just use the smaller tank until I get the bigger parts unlocked, but that would mess up my part counts for early career missions until I upgraded the VAB
